title: [PAID] [Splits] [$500] Split scan - Split button is not disabled after clicking split for group chat split request
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com.
2. Go to workspace chat.
3. Create a scan split request.
4. Click on the split request while it is scanning.
5. Click Split.
6. Note that the split button is disabled.
7. Go to group chat.
8. Create a scan split request.
9. Click on the split request while it is scanning.
10. Click Split.

Expected result: The split button will be disabled, similar to the behavior for split scan request in workspace chat.

Actual result: None
